rukus.text: 76|1|Jaqinan, zamoni tulonie ʙar inson guzast, ki cize [muhimmu] qoʙili zikr naʙud
76|2|Ba rosti, Mo insonro az nutfai muxtalit [omexta]-e ofaridem, uro meozmoem. Pas, uro sunavovu ʙino qaror dodem
76|3|Hamono Mo rohro ʙa u nison dodem, xoh siposguzor ʙosad jo nosipos
76|4|Ba rosti, Mo ʙaroi kofiron zancirho va ʙandho va otasi suzon muhajjo kardaem
76|5|Be gumon, nakukoron [dar ʙihist] az come menusand, ki omexta ʙa kofur ast
76|6|[Az] Casmae, ki ʙandagoni [xosi] Alloh taolo az on menusand, [har vaqtu] har co ʙixohand on [casma]-ro cori mesozand
76|7|[Bandagoni nakukor] Ba nazr vafo mekunand va az ruze metarsand, ki [azoʙu] sarri on farogir ast
76|8|Va ƣizoro ʙo in ki [nijoz va] dust dorand, ʙa mustamandu jatim va asir meʙaxsand
76|9|[Va dar dil megujand] «Mo faqat ʙa xotiri Alloh taolo ʙa sumo ƣizo medihem, na az sumo podose mexohem va na sipose
76|10|Hamono mo az Parvardigoramon metarsem, [az azoʙi] ruze, ki tursru va dusvor ast»
76|11|Pas, Alloh taolo ononro az [saxti va] sarri on ruz nigah dost va ʙa eson xurrami va sodmoni ʙaxsid
76|12|Va ʙa [sukronai] saʙre, ki kardand, ʙihist va [liʙoshoi] harir [-i ʙihisti] ʙa eson podos dod
76|13|Dar on co ʙar taxtho [-i zeʙo] takja kardaand, na [harorati] oftoʙe dar on co meʙined va na [suzi] sarmoe
76|14|Va sojahojas ʙar onon furu aftoda va mevahojas [ʙaroi cidan] dar dastras ast
76|15|Va dar girdogirdi eson zarfhoi simin [-i ƣizo] va kosahoi ʙulurin [-i nusidani] gardonida mesavad
76|16|[Kosahoi] Bulurine az nuqra, ki onhoro ʙa andozai munosiʙ [laʙrez va] omoda kardaand
76|17|Va dar on co comhoe seroʙ mesavand, ki omezaas zancaʙil ast
76|18|[In comho az] Casmae pur megardad, ki dar on co Salsaʙil nomida mesavad
76|19|Va hamvora navcavonone covidona ʙar girdason mecarxand, ki har goh onhoro ʙuʙini, gumon mekuni, ki marvoridi parokanda hastand
76|20|Va cun [ʙa har samte] ʙingari, on co ne'mati ʙisjor va farmonravoii azime meʙini
76|21|Bar onon [ʙihistijon] liʙoshoe saʙzrang az deʙoi nozuk va deʙoi zaxim [pusonida suda]- ast va ʙo dastʙandhoe az nuqra orosta sudaand va Parvardigorason saroʙi pok ʙa eson menusonad
76|22|[Va ʙa onho gufta mesavad] «In [ne'matho] podosi sumost va [ʙidoned, ki] az sa'ju kusisi sumo qadrdoni sudaast»
